dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT a.user_name user_name, a.email_address email_address, a.start_date date_setup, a.end_date term_date, sup.segment1 vendor_no, sup.vendor_name vendor_name, site.vendor_site_code vendor_site_code, cr.user_name created_by, DECODE(sign(trunc(NVL(a.end_date,(sysdate+1))-sysdate)),1,'Active',0,'Active',-1,'Inactive') User_status FROM fnd_user cr, ap_supplier_sites_all site, ap_suppliers sup, AK_WEB_USER_SEC_ATTR_VALUES ssite, AK_WEB_USER_SEC_ATTR_VALUES suser, fnd_user a WHERE TRUNC(a.creation_date) BETWEEN TRUNC(apps.fnd_conc_date.string_to_date(NVL(:p_from_date,a.creation_date))) AND TRUNC(apps.fnd_conc_date.string_to_date(NVL(:p_to_date,a.creation_date))) AND sup.segment1=nvl(:p_vend_no,sup.segment1) AND sup.vendor_name=nvl(:p_vend_name,sup.vendor_name) AND suser.web_user_id=a.user_id AND suser.attribute_code='ICX_SUPPLIER_ORG_ID' AND ssite.web_user_id=a.user_id AND suser.attribute_application_id=177 AND ssite.attribute_code='ICX_SUPPLIER_SITE_ID' AND ssite.attribute_application_id=177 AND sup.vendor_id=suser.number_value AND site.vendor_site_id=ssite.number_value AND a.created_by=NVL(:p_reg_by,a.created_by) AND cr.user_id=a.created_by ORDER BY a.user_name,site.vendor_site_code
